snippet.title: Develop 2010 Rare Keynote
snippet.description:
The Develop Conference plays host to speakers from all over the games industry, including Rare's very own Executive Producer of Technology & Communications Nick Burton.

In his keynote, Nick discussed how the future is controller-free games and entertainment. His presentation contains never-seen-before footage of The Fast and the Furriest, as well as prototype videos of football from Kinect Sports.
